quote: Human thought, flying on the trapezes of the star-filled universe, with mathematics stretched beneath, was like an acrobat working with a net but suddenly noticing that in reality there is no net.
quote_letters: HUMAN THOUGHT FLYING ON THE TRAPEZES OF THE STAR-FILLED UNIVERSE WITH MATHEMATICS STRETCHED BENEATH WAS LIKE AN ACROBAT WORKING WITH A NET BUT SUDDENLY NOTICING THAT IN REALITY THERE IS NO NET
